item.title: Create Viral Dance Video to a Song - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create a viral dance video to a song. The video should be engaging, energetic, and have the potential to go viral on social media platforms such as TikTok and Instagram. This job requires creativity, excellent dance skills, and the ability to choreograph and execute dance moves that are appealing to a wide audience. The video should be professionally filmed and edited to ensure high-quality production. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating dance videos that have gained significant attention and engagement. This is an exciting opportunity to showcase your talent and potentially gain exposure in the entertainment industry.

Skills required:
- Dance choreography
- Creativity
- Videography
- Video editing
- Social media savvy


Posted On: June 25, 2024 03:49 UTC
Category: Music Performance
Skills:Video Editing, Music Video, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Dancing, Choreography
Skills: Video Editing, Music Video, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Dancing, Choreography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Demo Video Development for Legal AI Product - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video developer to create a captivating demo video for our innovative legal AI product. The video will serve as a powerful marketing tool to showcase the features and benefits of our product. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating engaging and visually appealing videos that effectively convey complex concepts.

    Responsibilities:
    - Collaborate with our team to understand the key features and value proposition of our legal AI product
    - Develop a script and storyboard for the demo video
    - Create captivating visuals and animations to highlight the functionalities of the product
    - Incorporate appropriate voice-over and background music to enhance the video's impact
    - Deliver a high-quality video that aligns with our brand guidelines and target audience

    Skills required:
    - Video editing and production expertise
    - Proficiency in animation and motion graphics software
    - Strong storytelling and scriptwriting abilities
    - Understanding of legal technology and AI concepts

    This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an expert video developer who can bring our legal AI product to life through an engaging demo video.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 03:27 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Explainer Video, Animation, Motion Graphics
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Explainer Video, Animation, Motion Graphics
Country: Singapore
click to apply
